column5: Steve, I really wish I had your video editing skills! I got a new Go Pro....but have no clue with the software. Nice fish too!

Steve, I really wish I had your video editing skills! I got a new Go Pro....but have no clue with the software. Nice fish too! Thanks man. I'm not expert on it and certainly still learning.  I try to experiment with something new every time, only way to learn.  Same with fishing!
